synopsis: With the capital retaken and the Liones Kingdom slowly getting back on its feet, Meliodas, Elizabeth and Hawk turn their attention to the Boar Hat.
Ban and Meliodas meet to continue the duel they left unfinished before, only to find that Hawk has told everyone about their solemn battle.
King is overjoyed to spend the day of the festival with Diane, but he's struggling to figure out how to take the next step.
Business at the Boar Hat is dropping, so Meliodas asks Merlin to join the staff as a waitress alongside Elizabeth and Diane to attract customers.
